publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1208 Michael Matheson: Cowdenhill Quarry, Banknock—That the Parliament applauds the decision by the Scottish Government’s Directorate for Planning and Environmental Appeals, based in Falkirk, to uphold the decision by Falkirk Council not to allow the expansion of the Cowdenhill Quarry in Banknock; believes that this is the right decision; recognises the work done by Banknock Residents Against Cowdenhill Expansion (BRACE) in campaigning against the development over a number of years, and congratulates the people of Banknock who have shown real community spirit in their fight against this development.

S3M-1208 Cowdenhill Quarry, Banknock (lodged on 23 January 2008) Jamie Hepburn*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Kenneth Gibson*, Bill Kidd*, Sandra White*, Roseanna Cunningham*, John Wilson*, Alex Neil*, Christina McKelvie*, Aileen Campbell*

S3M-1208 Michael Matheson: Cowdenhill Quarry, Banknock—That the Parliament applauds the decision by the Scottish Government’s Directorate for Planning and Environmental Appeals, based in Falkirk, to uphold the decision by Falkirk Council not to allow the expansion of the Cowdenhill Quarry in Banknock; believes that this is the right decision; recognises the work done by Banknock Residents Against Cowdenhill Expansion (BRACE) in campaigning against the development over a number of years, and congratulates the people of Banknock who have shown real community spirit in their fight against this development. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Hugh O’Donnell, Kenneth Gibson, Bill Kidd, Sandra White, Roseanna Cunningham, John Wilson, Alex Neil, Christina McKelvie, Aileen Campbell
S3M-1208 Cowdenhill Quarry, Banknock (lodged on 23 January 2008) Gil Paterson*
